title: Bundling tensorflow app to desktop
body_html:
I have got a tensorflow based app which recognizes the objects state. I use opencv and tensorflow to get this done. The final application has to be a desktop app. How do I bundle all dependencies and export it for desktop?

PS: I have asked the same question in stackoverflow with no response for my question hence Im asking this here hoping for a positive reply

body:
I have got a tensorflow based app which recognizes the objects state. I use opencv and tensorflow to get this done. The final application has to be a desktop app. How do I bundle all dependencies and export it for desktop?

**PS:** I have asked the same question in stackoverflow with no response for my question hence Im asking this here hoping for a positive reply
